DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Two Caloric Supplements Prevention Weight Loss Patients With AIDS Who Take Daily Multivitamin Mineral Supplements
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize one 3 study arm : Arm 1 - Peptamen drink + multivitamin mineral supplement , take addition regular diet 4 month Arm 2 - NuBasics drink equivalent amount NuBasics soup bar + multivitamin mineral supplement , take addition regular diet 4 month Arm 3 - Multivitamin mineral supplement , take addition regular diet 4 month . At month 0 , 2 , 4 , patient assess weight , body cell mass , patient-reported physical activity level , dietary intake ( 24-hour dietary recall ) . At month 2 4 , also assess compliance study regimen . Patients complete 4 month follow visit provide 30 day supply caloric supplement choice ( Peptamen NuBasics ) 30 day supply study multivitamin supplement .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : HIV infection . Stable weight . CD4+ cell count < 200 cells/mm3 . Life expectancy least 6 month . Parent legal guardian sign write , informed consent patient < 18 year old . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Active opportunistic infection , require acute treatment . Malignancy ( stable cutaneous Kaposi 's sarcoma require systemic chemotherapy ) . Diabetes mellitus condition require special dietary restriction . Body mass index ( BMI ) > = 29.0 kg/m2 .
